vote.title: Authorize Amendment No. 1 to the Interlocal Agreement between the City of Dallas and Dallas Area Rapid Transit (DART) to provide “on-demand” transportation services for the residents of the Joppa neighborhood utilizing DART’s ”on-demand” transportation services to (1) extend the term of the agreement from November 15, 2024 to March 15, 2027; (2) increase the authorized destinations from six to nine destinations; and (3) increase the number of allowed trips per day from two to four trips at no additional cost, during the construction of a pedestrian bridge over the Union Pacific Railroad tracks that parallel the existing Linfield vehicular bridge - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Authorize Amendment No. 1 to the Interlocal Agreement between the City of Dallas and Dallas Area Rapid Transit (DART) to provide “on-demand” transportation services for the residents of the Joppa neighborhood utilizing DART’s ”on-demand” transportation services to (1) extend the term of the agreement from November 15, 2024 to March 15, 2027; (2) increase the authorized destinations from six to nine destinations; and (3) increase the number of allowed trips per day from two to four trips at no additional cost, during the construction of a pedestrian bridge over the Union Pacific Railroad tracks that parallel the existing Linfield vehicular bridge - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
